item.title: Raspberry Pi + Arduino + SPI
item.description: This tutorial will show you how to communicate from your raspberry pi to your arduino using 3-wire SPI. Requirements 1 Raspberry pi (running Raspbian) 1 Arduino 4 wires Your raspberry pi should be running the newest version of Raspbian. To ensure your system is up-to-date please download and run rpi-update. Wiring Arduino Open your Arduino ide and flash the below code to your Arduino.
